text: @realDonaldTrump The coronavirus press conference was interesting. The doctor was beautiful he described and explained how an expert should. Mike Pence and the others gravelled pathetically.I got a laugh out of how you looked at the doctor as he was talking you don’t like Expert opinions

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
